title: help!!!
content: what happens if you get caught sneaking someone into the girls hostel

comments.body:
If it's a girl ,
At worst you'll be made to write a letter to the VC and hostel director and maybe they'll contact your parents. This is what they do in boys hostel. Usually they let you go with a warning but not sure how strict the girls hostel is.

If it's a boy 
God save you
keep us updated if you do it, atb!
It depends on your gender, if you are male you are truly fucked
Then mess around and find out
My predictions are always absolute ðŸ˜Ž
I walked in with a girl into boys hostel tho warden didn't say anything just asked if she was my friend
